title: text file upload fails: the uploaded file was only partially uploaded
body:
### expected behaviour
file upload via web interface should succeed, especially if it is not a big file.

### actual behaviour
failed with the message  "the uploaded file was only partially uploaded"

### steps to reproduce
1. prepare: download this file and extract it https://s3.owncloud.com/owncloud/public.php?service=files&t=b30321e9e47aa25bf22de9841d257485 it is the failing text file in compressed form.
2. try to upload it via web interface (drag and drop or by clicking on the upload arrow does not matter)
3. according to the progress bar the (almost?) whole file will be transferred, then the error message is displayed

### server configuration
operating system: ubuntu 12.04 and some suse

web server: apache 2.2.22 and some apache

database: mysql 5.5.32 and some mysql

php version: 5.3.10 and ?

owncloud version: 5.0.11 and 5.0.9

### client configuration
browser: firefox 23, qupzilla 1.4.3

operating system: kubuntu 13.04

### logs
#### web server error log
nothing is logged

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
nothing is logged

#### browser log

return from upload.php:
```
{"data":{"message":"the uploaded file was only partially uploaded","uploadmaxfilesize":537919488,"maxhumanfilesize":"upload max. 513 mb","usedspacepercent":0},"status":"error"}
```

the error message is thrown in apps/files/ajax/upload.php line 74. so far, there is not really some php magic going on, as far as i checked it. might be js related..
